comments.content:
Looks alright to me. It's spaced wide, but the spacing seems fairly even. Then again, I've never done any work in Verlag.

Maybe the D could stand to be closer to the E, but that might be pushing it.

The spacing between the A and the S is naturally tighter. You might try playing with that a bit. But really, it looks fine as it is.
Thanks Palatine. Verlag is pretty forgiving. I might just be being too picky!

DE needs less space. PA needs more. AS needs less. It is fairly close though. DE is the farthest from correct.

Looks close.
